field.title: UNDER-REPRESENTED GROUPS
field.content:
We also have private "opt-in" channels for under represented groups within our society — lease let us know if you'd like to request a new one. Respecting your privacy, these are not assigned to you as roles but rather as direct additions to the channel access allowlists.
:transgender_flag: #trans - A space for the trans* friends of CompSoc :heart: #poc - A space for people of colour :rainbow_flag: #lgbtqia+ - A space with queer vibes :woman: #women - A space for women :hindu_temple: #hinduism - A space for [TODO] :church: #christianity - A christian space
